NekoDrive Usage

It's extremely simple:

 # download and install dokan 0.5.3 http://dokan-dev.net/en/
 # download and install .NET Framework 2.0
 # download and install NekoDrive
 # on ubuntu server you may have to specify the uid and gid aon the export as the following example:

/folder 192.168.0.14(rw,no_subtree_check,sync,insecure,anonuid=1000,anongid=1000)
